# Stock Nexus Android App - Copilot Instructions

This is an Android native application that replicates the Stock Nexus inventory management system with identical look and feel to the React web application.

## Project Overview

- **Platform**: Android Native (Kotlin + Jetpack Compose)
- **Architecture**: MVVM with Repository pattern
- **UI Framework**: Jetpack Compose with Material Design 3
- **Primary Color**: E6002A (matching web app)
- **Target**: Inventory Management System

## Key Features

- Dashboard with analytics and real-time data
- Inventory management (Items, Stock In/Out, Categories)
- User management (Staff, Roles, Permissions)
- Multi-branch operations (Regions, Districts, Branches)
- Analytics & Reports with charts
- Authentication & Authorization
- Dark/Light theme support
- Real-time notifications

## Development Guidelines

- Use Kotlin for all Android code
- Follow Material Design 3 principles
- Implement responsive design for phones and tablets
- Maintain consistent theming with web application
- Use Jetpack Compose for modern UI development
- Follow clean architecture principles
- Implement comprehensive testing strategy

## Code Style

- Follow Kotlin coding conventions
- Use dependency injection with Hilt
- Implement proper error handling
- Use coroutines for async operations
- Follow single responsibility principle
